description.zh-cn: 中国内科医学家、医学教育家及中国消化病学的奠基人。
description.en: Chinese internist, medical educator, and founder of Chinese gastroenterology.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Zhang Xiaoqian.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞曾就读的中学。
description.en: The middle school that Zhang Xiaoqian attended.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞的母校，他曾在此学习、任教并担任院长。
description.en: Zhang Xiaoqian's alma mater, where he studied, taught, and served as president.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一个州，其政府曾授予张孝骞医学博士学位。
description.en: A state in the United States whose government awarded Zhang Xiaoqian a Doctor of Medicine degree.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞长期工作和任教的医学院，曾担任副校长等职务。
description.en: The medical school where Zhang Xiaoqian worked and taught for a long time, holding positions such as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞曾在此进行研究的美国大学。
description.en: An American university where Zhang Xiaoqian once conducted research.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞曾在此进行研究的美国大学。
description.en: An American university where Zhang Xiaoqian once conducted research.

description.zh-cn: 曾邀请张孝骞赴美考察讲学的美国政府部门。
description.en: The U.S. government department that invited Zhang Xiaoqian to the United States for an academic tour.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高的学术研究机构。
description.en: The national academy of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场重大政治运动，期间张孝骞受到迫害。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China during which Zhang Xiaoqian was persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理，曾在文革期间过问张孝骞的情况。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who intervened in Zhang Xiaoqian's situation during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家级医学科学研究机构，张孝骞曾任副院长。
description.en: The national-level medical research institution of the People's Republic of China, where Zhang Xiaoqian served as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家最高学术机构、科学技术最高咨询机构。
description.en: The national academy for natural sciences of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张孝骞逝世的医院。
description.en: The hospital where Zhang Xiaoqian passed away.

description.zh-cn: 1914年以第一名的成绩毕业。
description.en: Graduated first in his class in 1914.

description.zh-cn: 1914年以第一名的成绩被录取，1921年以第一名毕业。
description.en: Admitted as the top student in 1914 and graduated first in his class in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 授予张孝骞医学博士学位。
description.en: Awarded Zhang Xiaoqian a Doctor of Medicine degree.

description.zh-cn: 毕业后留校专攻内科。
description.en: After graduation, he stayed at the school to specialize in internal medicine.

description.zh-cn: 到北京协和医学院深造1年。
description.en: Went to Peking Union Medical College for one year of advanced study.

position.zh-cn: 住院医师、总住院医师、副教授、内科消化专业组主管
position.en: Resident, Chief Resident, Associate Professor, Head of the Gastroenterology Division of Internal Medicine

description.zh-cn: 在协和医学院陆续担任多个职务。
description.en: Held various positions successively at Peking Union Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 被选送到约翰斯·霍普金斯大学进行研究。
description.en: Was selected to go to Johns Hopkins University for research.

description.zh-cn: 赴史丹福大学进行研究。
description.en: Went to Stanford University for research.

description.zh-cn: 回长沙接任湘雅医学院院长职务，并领导学院在战争期间迁校。
description.en: Returned to Changsha to assume the presidency of Xiangya Medical College and led the college's relocation during the war.

description.zh-cn: 邀请张孝骞赴美国考察医学教育和讲学。
description.en: Invited Zhang Xiaoqian to the United States for a tour to inspect medical education and give lectures.

position.zh-cn: 内科学教授、内科主任、副校长
position.en: Professor of Internal Medicine, Head of Internal Medicine, Vice President
Member (Academician) of the Department of Biology

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，张孝骞被打成“反动学术权威”、“特务”，备受侮辱和折磨。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhang Xiaoqian was labeled a 'reactionary academic authority' and 'spy', and was subjected to humiliation and torture.

description.zh-cn: 亲自过问张孝骞在文革中的处境，并为其安排住所。
description.en: Personally intervened regarding Zhang Xiaoqian's situation during the Cultural Revolution and arranged housing for him.
